SEARCH
Package HWSystem

Class HWSystem

java.lang.Object
HWSystem.HWSystem
public class HWSystem extends Object
Central controller class that manages all hardware operations and protocols.

  • Constructor Details

    • HWSystem

      public HWSystem()

  • Method Details

    • addDevice

      public void addDevice(String devName, int portID, int devID)
      Adds a new device to the system on the specified port and device slot. Supports various types like sensors, displays, wireless adapters, and motor drivers. Performs protocol compatibility and ID collision checks.
      Parameters:
      devName - the type/name of the device (e.g., "DHT11", "LCD")
      portID - the port ID where the device will be connected
      devID - the device ID for indexing within its category

    • removeDevice

      public void removeDevice(int portID)
      Removes the device connected to the given port. The device must be turned OFF before it can be removed.
      Parameters:
      portID - the ID of the port to remove the device from

    • turnOn

      public void turnOn(int portID)
      Turns ON the device connected to the specified port.
      Parameters:
      portID - the ID of the port where the device is located

    • turnOff

      public void turnOff(int portID)
      Turns OFF the device connected to the specified port.
      Parameters:
      portID - the ID of the port where the device is located

    • listPorts

      public void listPorts()
      Lists all ports and their current states. Shows protocol, occupancy status, and device details if present.

    • listDevicesByType

      public void listDevicesByType(String devType)
      Lists all devices of the given type that are currently connected.
      Parameters:
      devType - the device type to list (e.g., "Sensor", "Display")

    • readSensor

      public void readSensor(int devID)
      Reads data from a sensor by device ID. The sensor must be turned ON. Displays formatted output using data2String().
      Parameters:
      devID - the ID of the sensor to read from

    • printDisplay

      public void printDisplay(int devID, String str)
      Sends a string message to a display device. The display must be turned ON.
      Parameters:
      devID - the ID of the display
      str - the string message to display

    • readWireless

      public void readWireless(int devID)
      Reads data from a wireless communication device. The device must be turned ON. Output is printed to terminal.
      Parameters:
      devID - the ID of the wireless device

    • writeWireless

      public void writeWireless(int devID, String str)
      Sends data to a wireless communication device. The device must be turned ON.
      Parameters:
      devID - the ID of the wireless device
      str - the message to send

    • setMotorSpeed

      public void setMotorSpeed(int devID, int speed)
      Sets the speed of a motor driver device. The motor must be turned ON and speed must be non-negative.
      Parameters:
      devID - the ID of the motor driver
      speed - the speed value to set

    • loadConfig

      public void loadConfig(String fileName)
      Loads the hardware system configuration from a file. Initializes ports and device slots based on given limits and protocol setup.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the configuration file

    • runCommands

      public void runCommands(String commandLine)
      Parses and executes a single command line. Supports all user-level commands like addDev, turnON, readSensor, etc.
      Parameters:
      commandLine - the full command line string entered by the user

    • writeLogs

      public void writeLogs(String errputPath)
      Writes all port logs to individual log files in the given directory. Each port's log is saved as "<Protocol>_<PortID>.log".
      Parameters:
      errputPath - the folder path where log files will be saved
